articles.title: Dutee Chand reveals she was diagnosed with testicular cancer amid 4-year dope ban - Moneycontrol
articles.description: "I felt very scary, nervous, thinking what has happened to my life," Chand told PTI. The diagnosis was done by Dr Sudeep Satpathy, a professor at the Kalinga Institute of Medical Sciences (KIMS) in Bhubaneswar.
articles.content:
Indias fastest woman athlete Dutee Chand revealed that she was diagnosed with testicular cancer. She was asked to quit sports by her doctor after her Stage 1 diagnosis in November 2021.
